tns:patch.author: Gabriel Inchauspe
tns:patch.description: Create needed data and view for PI9 in Global Settings table.

script.lang: select count(*) from org.digijava.module.aim.dbentity.AmpGlobalSettings where globalSettingsName='Budget Support for PI 9'

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW `v_g_settings_BSO` AS SELECT cv.id AS `id`,cv.category_value AS `value` FROM amp_category_value cv, amp_category_class cc WHERE cv.amp_category_class_id = cc.id AND cc.keyName = 'financing_instrument';
INSERT INTO amp_global_settings (`settingsName`,`settingsValue`,`possibleValues`,`description`,`section`) VALUES ('Budget Support for PI 9', '', 'v_g_settings_BSO','Select one or more Budget Support types that will be used for calculating PI 9.', 'general');
